extension.summary: Criar, visualizar, editar e excluir o arquivo advancedsettings.xml
extension.description: Com esta ferramenta podes criar as tuas configuracoes avancadas diretamente do XBMC ou KODI.Se não sabes o que uma configuracao faz, não o inicies!

extension.summary: International TV and radio steams brought to you by - [COLOR yellowgreen]B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S[/COLOR] The Source -
המקור -[COLOR yellowgreen] B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S [/COLOR]- שידורי טלוויזיה ורדיו בינלאומי בחסות
extension.description:
[COLOR yellowgreen]B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S[/COLOR] video plugin is a collection of Live TV and Radio streams from around the world.
[COLOR yellowgreen]B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S[/COLOR] source is brought to you by the people and for the people. With your support, we will give back even more for all of us! Let's get started! Website :[COLOR blue][B]http://www.bbtsip.tv[/B][/COLOR] Plugin by @koderdude

הוא אוסף של ערוצי טלוויזיה ורדיו [COLOR yellowgreen] B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S [/COLOR]תוסף הוידאו בשידור חי מכל רחבי העולם.
המקור הובא לכם על-ידי המשתמשים ולמען המשתמשים. עם התמיכה שלכם, אנו נחזיר בחזרה עוד יותר לכולנו! אז בואו נתחיל!
לאתר אינטרנט: [COLOR blue][B]http://www.bbtsip.tv [/B][/COLOR] @koderdude תוסף על ידי
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is maintained by the [COLOR yellowgreen]B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S[/COLOR] community and our generator fetches indexs from multiple sources from around the web. We accept no responsibility for the following content, streams and or media. [COLOR yellowgreen]B[/COLOR][COLOR dodgerblue]B[/COLOR][COLOR white]T[/COLOR][COLOR orangered]S[/COLOR] does not host or stream any of the content displayed on this add-on.

תוסף זה מתוחזק על ידי קהילת והמחולל שלנו מביאים את האנידקסים ממקורות מרובים מרחבי האינטרנט. אנו לא מקבלים שום אחריות לתכנים הבאים, שידורים חיים או תוכן בכל צורה שלא יהיה. אנו לא מארחים או משדרים את התוכן שמוצג על-ידי התוסף.

extension.description: Please visit [COLOR blue]www.tvaddons.co[/COLOR] for Exodus support and assistance! Kindly note that Exodus is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.
extension.description: Bitte besuche [COLOR blue]www.tvaddons.co[/COLOR] für Unterstützung und Fragen zu Exodus! Beachte dabei, dass Exodus nicht offizieller Teil des Media Players ist den du gerade verwendest und daher nicht von dem offiziellen Support-Kanäle abgedeckt wird, dieses Addon hat nichts zu tun mit dem Media-Player selbst, noch ist es dafür beabsichtigt, es handelt sich hierbei lediglich um ein Drittanbieter-Anwendung die dem System hinzugefügt wurde.
extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.
extension.description: SVP visitez [COLOR blue]www.tvaddons.co[/COLOR] pour avoir de l'aide sur Exodus. Prenez note qu'Exodus n'est pas une partie intégrante de votre outil de visionnement multimedia et SVP ne le mentionnez pas dans les media sociaux officiels, cet addiciel n'a rien a voir avec votre lecteur multimedia lui même, c'est simplement un addiciel qui a été ajouté à votre système.
extension.disclaimer: L'auteur n'héberge pas ou ne distribue pas le contenu qui vous est affiché avec cet addiciel. L'auteur n'a pas d'alliance avec les distributeurs de contenu.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.description: ADD-ON DESCONTINUADO! Os canais/este add-on são gratuitos. Não transmito qualquer dos canais aqui disponibilizados! São todos retirados da Internet! Todos os canais necessitam do add-on PLEXUS
Playlist Loader
The Ultimate Movie, TV Show, and Playlist Add-on
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: This is a clone of ARNU Box Speed Tester. No you can know how much speed your internet provider gives to you.

Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo que poderá ser reproduzido a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer parte no desenvolvimento de qualquer uma das tecnologias. Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

El autor no aloja ni distribuye cualquier contenido que ud. pudiera reproducir usando este addon. El autor no tiene participacion en el desarrollo de cualquier tecnologia incluida. Cuando requiera ayuda en el foro de Kodi por favor respete las reglas (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

extension.description: Addon Description

This repository is for you to have all the addons created by me, updated automatically. In this repository you will also find other repositories and add-ons. All repositories and add-ons that are here are add-ons developed by third parties to use on the software Kodi (Not Official Add-ons), as Kodi be a OpenSource project as soon not have any connection with the Kodi.tv.

Este repositório serve para que tenhas todos os add-ons criados por mim, actualizados de forma automática. Neste repositório irás encontrar também outros repositórios e add-ons. Todos os repositórios e add-ons que se encontram aqui são add-ons desenvolvidos por terceiros para usar no programa Kodi (Add-ons Não Oficiais), visto o Kodi ser um projecto OpenSource, logo não têm qualquer ligação com o Kodi.tv.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
